DOC.brief_title: Muscle Malonyl Coa Biomarker Assay Development
DOC.detailed_description: This non-drug method study terminate November 19 , 2009 . The decision terminate base safety concern ( biopsy-related pain ) observe first set subject . Four subject give sample tolerate well . No data collect report .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Female subject nonchildbearing potential . An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic , ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) , muscle disease , diabetes , severe uncontrolled hypertension . Any significant bleeding diathesis could preclude recovery biopsy procedure . ASA , ibuprofen , oral anti platelet agent discontinue least 7 day prior procedure . Prothrombin time ( PT ) /INR and/or activate partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) respective local laboratory normal range . Abnormal CK per CRU laboratory range . Subjects either medical history physical evidence keloid scar formation upon physical examination . 12 lead ECG demonstrate clinically significant abnormality . Females child bear potential , pregnant nursing female females less 6 month postpartum schedule date collection . Known hypersensitivity lidocaine component study procedure . Participation nonroutine rigorous exercise ( eg , road race , heavy lifting , etc . ) within one week prior muscle biopsy procedure . Professional athlete .
DOC.keyword: Muscle biopsy Malonyl CoA Biomarker assay
